title: Billbee
description:
Documentation of the Billbee REST API to connect a Billbee account to external aplications.

## Endpoint

The Billbee API endpoint base url is https://app.billbee.io/api/v1 

## Activation

You have to enable the API in the settings of your Billbee account. In addition you need a Billbee API Key identifying the application you develop. To get an API key, send a mail to support@billbee.io and send us a short note about what you are building.

## Authorization & security

Because you can access private data with the Billbee API, every request has to be sent over https and must

* Contain a valid API Key identifying the application/developer. It has to be sent as the HTTP header X-Billbee-Api-Key
* Contain a valid user login with billbee username and api password in form of a basic auth HTTP header

## Throttling

Each endpoint has a throttle of max 2 requests per second per combination of API Key and Billbee user.

When you exceed these 2 calls, the API will return a HTTP 429 status code

X-Billbee-Api-Key.label: X-Billbee-Api-Key (X-Billbee-Api-Key)
X-Billbee-Api-Key.note: To identify the app developer, each API request has do contain a valid API Key in the HTTP header X-Billbee-Api-Key.

username.label: Username (basic)
username.note: To authenticate an API request, the Billbee username/email and an API password have to be provided as a BasicAuth header.

password.label: Password (basic)
password.note: To authenticate an API request, the Billbee username/email and an API password have to be provided as a BasicAuth header.

AutomaticProvisioning_CreateAccount.title: Creates a new Billbee user account with the data passed

AutomaticProvisioning_TermsInfo.title: Returns infos about Billbee terms and conditions

CloudStorageApi_GetList.title: Gets a list of all connected cloud storage devices

Customer_GetAll.title: Get a list of all customers

Customer_GetCustomerAddress.title: Queries a single address from a customer

Customer_PatchAddress.title: Updates one or more fields of an address
Customer_PatchAddress.description: Id and CustomerId cannot be changed

Customer_UpdateAddress.title: Updates all fields of an address
Customer_UpdateAddress.description: Id and CustomerId cannot be changed. Fields you do not send will become empty.

Customer_GetOne.title: Queries a single customer by id

Customer_GetCustomerAddresses.title: Queries a list of addresses from a customer

Customer_AddCustomerAddress.title: Adds a new address to a customer
Customer_AddCustomerAddress.description: Id and  CustomerId will be ignored in model. If Id is set, the addition will be stopped.

Customer_GetCustomerOrders.title: Queries a list of orders from a customer

EnumApi_GetOrderStates.title: Returns a list with all defined orderstates

EnumApi_GetPaymentTypes.title: Returns a list with all defined paymenttypes

EventApi_GetList.title: Get a list of all events optionally filtered by date

OrderApi_GetList.title: Get a list of all orders optionally filtered by date

OrderApi_PostNewOrder.title: Creates a new order in the Billbee account
OrderApi_PostNewOrder.description:
To create an order POST an JSON object to the orders endpoint with the shown properties. 
Not all properties are required.

OrderApi_CreateDeliveryNote.title: Create an delivery note for an existing order

OrderApi_CreateInvoice.title: Create an invoice for an existing order

OrderApi_GetPatchableFields.title: Returns a list of fields which can be updated with the orders/{id} patch call

OrderApi_Find.title: Find a single order by its external id (order number)

OrderApi_GetByExtRef.title: Get a single order by its internal billbee id

OrderApi_GetInvoiceList.title: Get a list of all invoices optionally filtered by date

OrderApi_Get.title: Get a single order by its internal billbee id

OrderApi_PatchOrder.title: Updates one or more fields of an order

OrderApi_UpdateState.title: Changes the main state of a single order
OrderApi_UpdateState.description:
### REMARKS ###
Use this call to change the state of an order to i.e. paid or sent.

The state is transfered to the external shop/marketplace if configured.
This is the list of known states:
- 1: ordered
- 2: confirmed
- 3: paid
- 4: shipped
- 5: reclamation
- 6: deleted
- 7: closed
- 8: canceled
- 9: archived
- 10: not used
- 11: demand note 1
- 12: demand note 2
- 13: packed
- 14: offered
- 15: payment reminder

OrderApi_SendMessage.title: Sends a message to the buyer

OrderApi_AddShipment.title: Add a shipment to a given order

OrderApi_TagsCreate.title: Attach one or more tags to an order
OrderApi_TagsCreate.description: When a tag is already attached, it is ignored. Tags are not case sensitive.

OrderApi_TagsUpdate.title: Updates/Sets the tags attached to an order

Article_GetList.title: Get a list of all products

Article_GetPatchableFields.title: Returns a list of fields which can be updated with the patch call

Article_GetCategory.title: GEts a list of all defined categories

Article_GetCustomFields.title: Queries a list of all custom fields

Article_DeleteImage.title: Deletes a single image by id

Article_GetImage.title: Returns a single image by id

Article_GetReservedAmount.title: Queries the reserved amount for a single article by id or by sku

Article_UpdateStock.title: Update the stock qty of an article
Article_UpdateStock.description: The article is specified by sku. You have to send the absolute value for the current stock

Article_UpdateStockCode.title: Update the stock code of an article

Article_UpdateStockMultiple.title: Update the stock qty for multiple articles at once

Article_GetArticle.title: Queries a single article by id or by sku

Article_PatchArticle.title: Updates one or more fields of a product

Article_GetImages.title: Returns a list of all images of the product

Article_PutImages.title: Add multiple images to a product or replace the product images by the given images

Article_DeleteImageFromProduct.title: Deletes a single image from a product

Article_GetImageFromProduct.title: Returns a single image by id

Article_PutImage.title: Add or update an existing image of a product

Search_Search.title:
Search for products, customers and orders.
Type can be "order", "product" and / or "customer"
Term can contains lucene query syntax

Shipment_PostShipment.title: Creates a new shipment with the selected Shippingprovider

Shipment_GetList.title: Get a list of all shipments optionally filtered by date. All parameters are optional.

Shipment_ShipWithLabel.title: Creates a shipment for an order in billbee

WebHookManagement_Get.title: Gets all registered WebHooks for a given user.

WebHookManagement_Post.title: Registers a new WebHook for a given user.

WebHookManagement_GetFilters.title: Returns a list of all known filters you can use to register webhooks

WebHookManagement_Lookup.title: Looks up a registered WebHook with the given {id} for a given user.
